text: Monanthocitrus oblanceolata is a species of flowering plant in the citrus family, Rutaceae. It is endemic to Sabah in Malaysia.World Conservation Monitoring Centre. 1998. Monanthocitrus oblanceolata. In: IUCN 2013. IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2013.1. Downloaded on 03 August 2013. It was first described in 1988. ==References== oblanceolata Category:Endemic flora of Borneo Category:Flora of Sabah Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Plants described in 1988 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Monanthocitrus oblanceolata
